meta_description.title: How to Run Your Python Scripts - Real Python

snippet.heading: To run Python scripts with the python command, you need to open a command-line and type in the word python , or python3 if you have both versions, followed by the path to your script, just like this: $ python3 hello.py Hello World!
snippet.title: How to Run Your Python Scripts - Real Python

people_also_ask.title: How to Run Python Programs ( .py files ) on Windows 10 ( All ...

people_also_ask.question: How do I run a line of code in Python?
people_also_ask.heading: A widely used way to run Python code is through an interactive session. To start a Python interactive session, just open a command-line or terminal and then type in python , or python3 depending on your Python installation, and then hit Enter .
people_also_ask.title: How to Run Your Python Scripts - Real Python

people_also_ask.question: What is the key to run Python code?
people_also_ask.heading: On Macs, the shortcut for running your script is Fn + F5. In some Windows systems, it may be Fn + F5 or Ctrl + F5.
people_also_ask.title: Python 3 Notes: Intro to Python and IDLE

people_also_ask.question: How do I run a Python program in Windows 10?
people_also_ask.heading: Open Command Prompt and type “python” and hit enter. You will see a python version and now you can run your program there.28-Jul-2020
